mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE eid = #{eid}) AS user_exists;
mapper.insert: insert into user (USER_ID, EID, PWD, NIC, USER_INTRO, USER_IMG_PATH, SIGNUP_DTM, HOLD_PNT, MSG_ALOW_YN) values (#{userId}, #{eid}, #{pwd}, #{nic}, #{userIntro}, #{userImgPath}, now(), #{holdPnt}, true);
insert into user_status (SNO, USER_ID, COMT, USER_STUS_CD, USER_STUS_UPD_DTM, USER_STUS_UPDR_ID) values (1, #{userId}, default, 'ST00110', now(), #{userId})
mapper.select: select user_stus_cd from user_status where user_id = #{userId} order by USER_STUS_UPD_DTM DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT u.EID as eid, u.NIC as nic, u.USER_INTRO as userIntro, u.USER_IMG_PATH as userImgPath, u.MSG_ALOW_YN as msgAlowYn FROM user u INNER JOIN channel c ON u.USER_ID = c.CRT_ID WHERE c.CHNL_URI = #{chnlUri}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE nic = #{nic}) AS user_exists;
select u.user_img_path, u.nic, s.user_stus_cd from user u inner join user_status s on u.user_id = s.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} order by s.USER_STUS_UPD_DTM DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email (USER_ID, EXPI_DTM, EMAIL, CERTINO) VALUES (#{userId},now(),#{eid},'')
